short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Key mapping tool for Nintendo Switch Joy-Con.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key mapping tool for Nintendo Switch Joy-Con. This extension can fire any keyboard event when a Joy-Con button or stick operation is occurred.

Currently only the Joy-Con Left Controller is supported.
